attributes.action: Scrap the idea of banning legal highs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simply put if cannabis and or legal highs were LEGAL supply and demand from drug dealers would half over night.If cannabis/legal highs were taxed and controlled in legal headshops/coffee shops no one would pay for cannabis and or legal highs that are laced with boot polish or bee's wax or anything else thats puts us the users at risk!.

The complete lack of care from labour is disgusting the fact that we arse forced into buying products that may containt substances that could effect out health far worse than the active products within the cannabis/ legal highs just prooves how wrong they have it

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
